Plot: A Latina spin on Jane Austen's "Sense and Sensibility," where two spoiled sisters who have been left penniless after their father's sudden death are forced to move in with their estranged aunt in East Los Angeles.
Title: From Prada to Nada
Writer: Fina Torres (screenplay), Luis Alfaro (screenplay), Craig Fernandez (screenplay), Jane Austen (novel)
Actors: Camilla Belle, Alexa PenaVega, Tina French, Luis Rosales
